name: Boovovs All Knowledge at 60
description:
This mod give a character 10000 knowledge points when they hit level 60.

Not sure it if will work for characters that are already 60 at this point in time.
changeNote:
*Recreated/Updated the mod structure for the current version of the game: Conan Exiles Age or Sorcery, Chapter 3 - 05/31/2023
*Renamed all instances of "feat" to "knowledge" to match the ingame interface changes.
*Made a github repo for the mod so the files dont get lost again.
author: Boovov
